Title: Relates to online testing for civil service examinations
Summary: Authorizes the state civil service department, in its discretion, to offer online testing for examinations; directs the president of the state civil service commission to promulgate rules and regulations.
LawCode: Amd ยง50, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to online testing for civil service examinations
